title: Image Posting System Improvements & Bug Fixes
description:
## Summary of Improvements Made

### âœ… **Fixed Duplicate "Yesterday's Answer" Issue**
- **Problem**: Bot was sending yesterday's answer twice - once in a separate message and again in the main question message
- **Solution**: Removed the separate yesterday results message, keeping all information consolidated in the main question message
- **Result**: Clean, single message with yesterday's results + today's question + answer button

### âœ… **Enhanced Image Detection & Processing**
- **Problem**: Tenor URLs posted as plain text weren't being processed correctly
- **Solution**: Added logic to detect and properly resolve Tenor URLs in text messages using `_resolve_tenor_url()`
- **Result**: All image types now work: Discord embeds, uploaded attachments, direct image URLs, and Tenor URLs in text

### âœ… **Removed Redundant Instruction Text**
- **Problem**: "Please click the button below to submit your answer!" was cluttering the interface
- **Solution**: Removed instruction text entirely - the button is self-explanatory
- **Result**: Clean interface with just the essential information

### âœ… **Improved Permissions & Error Handling**
- **Problem**: Permissions checking wasn't comprehensive
- **Solution**: Updated permissions check to include Manage Messages (optional) and clearer error messages
- **Result**: Better user guidance when bot lacks required permissions

### âœ… **Added Debug Logging**
- **Problem**: Hard to diagnose image processing failures
- **Solution**: Added detailed debug logging for message detection, URL processing, and embed creation
- **Result**: Easier troubleshooting of edge cases with different image types

## Technical Implementation Details

**Files Modified:**
- `src/commands/post_question.py` - Main logic improvements
- `tests/integration/test_image_hiding.py` - Updated tests

**Key Features:**
- Single comprehensive message (question + yesterday's results)
- Robust image detection (embeds, attachments, URLs)
- Tenor GIF support (both embeds and text URLs)
- Automatic message cleanup
- Debug logging for troubleshooting

**Status: COMPLETED** - All improvements tested and working correctly.

title: Add Tenor GIF search integration

title: Improve image URL validation error messages
description: Current error messages are too technical. Users get 'Invalid content type: text/html' when trying to post webpage links instead of direct image URLs. Need more user-friendly messages that guide them to provide direct image links.

title: Implement hide image URLs feature
description:
ðŸŽ¯ **COMPLETED**: Implemented follow-up message image detection system

**Investigation Results:**
- Original URL hiding approach failed because Discord's Tenor GIF picker creates webpage links (text/html) instead of direct images
- Users experienced "Invalid content type: text/html" errors when trying to use Discord's native GIF picker

**Final Solution:**
- Removed image URL field from modal completely
- Implemented follow-up message detection: user posts question, then immediately posts image/GIF
- Bot automatically detects the image, deletes user's message, and re-posts image as bot
- 15-second timeout with graceful fallback

**Technical Implementation:**
- `_wait_for_image_attachment()` detects Discord embeds, Tenor GIFs, and uploaded images
- Always deletes user's image message to prevent duplication
- Posts question text, then separate image message from bot
- Works with all Discord image features (GIF picker, uploads, links)

**Benefits:**
âœ… Zero modal complexity - natural Discord workflow
âœ… Works with Discord's native GIF picker (Tenor integration)
âœ… Clean chat appearance - no URL clutter or duplicates
âœ… Images appear "as the bot" in separate messages
âœ… Automatic cleanup prevents message spam

**Status: RESOLVED** - Image posting now works seamlessly with Discord's native features.
